name: Graphictoria - 2009 ROBLOX Style
description:
The game is nostalgic enough, but the website isn't, so I tried to make it as accurate to the ROBLOX 2009 website as possible, as the Graphictoria client (of now) is 2009.

I could not use the banner as the search users button broke it.

discussions.name: How dare you mulipulate me into obeying this setting?
Works on all sites, thus unintentionally becoming the greatest theme ever to exist.
Please make this work on roblox
